overview: Directed by Celeste, Shay Jordan Lust is all about desire and succumbing to carnal pleasures. It features Digital Playground's lovely Eurasian, SHAY JORDAN in three scenes, and one of them is a luscious Three-Way. The entirely stellar cast also includes Annette Schwarz, Kristina Rose, Marie Luv, Dana DeArmond and Nikki Kane. These fine girls are fueled by pure desire, raw sex appeal and an intoxicating passion. Answering and defining their inherent sexual needs, they enjoy one another and ravish some very handsome men.
title: Shay Jordan: Lust
